roleset.name: include in some group, group together

role.descr: agent, entity causing some grouping, making an association
theme, thing being included in some group

example.name: typical, semi-prepositional usage
example.text: Dan E. Nelms , Valley Federal 's president and chief executive officer , said the one - time charge substantially eliminates future losses associated with the unit .

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: The Republican campaign , not directly through Lazio , but others was actually associating in certain ways Mrs. Clinton 's sympathies with the Arab sides in the Middle East with the attack on the battle ship Cole .

propbank.arg: not directly through Lazio , but others
Mrs. Clinton 's sympathies with the Arab sides in the Middle East
with the attack on the battle ship Cole

example.name: temp and arg 2 (arg 1 is outside of the span)
example.text: Washington Wizards ' owner ended the three - year association with Jordan

example.name: Arg 0 and an inanimate arg 2
example.text: Yang 's strongest association with New Year is of going to do the New Year 's shopping with the grown - ups when she was little .

example.name: One more with args 1 and 2
example.text: Its association with the Hashidate Law Office in Tokyo

propbank.arg: with the Hashidate Law Office in Tokyo

example.name: The more common 2 args
example.text: Mural thrombus is also associated with the right common iliac artery aneurysm .

propbank.arg: with the right common iliac artery aneurysm

example.name: args 1 and 2 again
example.text: Vit D might be associated with poorer outcomes

roleset.note: ASSOCIATE-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. Member of VNcls amalgamate-22.2-2. Comparison with 'include'. (from associate.01-v)
ASSOCIATION-N NOTES: Added due to expansion of Nombank. Comparison to 'associate.01'. Vn class amalgamate-22.2-2. FN class organization. Framed by Katie. (from association.01-n)
ASSOCIATED-J NOTES: Based on Sharp data. Comparison to associate.01. Associate.01 is a member of Vnclass amalgamate-22.2-2. Framed by Katie. (from associated.01-j)
